name: No Man's Spy (99lab)
description:
We are in an era where the expression "Information is power" never has been taken that seriously before. If you're a mercenary spy wich steals and sells informations by order and your new task is rob a physical media that contains secret information about the 66 Lab...

(PRESS F TO TURN ON THE FLASHLIGHT)
